body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your high-priority tasks: TASK-004 (unit tests for ai.ts) and TASK-005 (unit tests for youtube.ts). NOTE: developer-1 is setting up Vitest first (TASK-001). You can start writing test files now — just know the test runner config is incoming. Claim TASK-004 to start. Mock all external APIs, never call real services in tests.

TASK-001 (Vitest testing infra) is ready for review. 21 tests passing across errors and youtube modules. Config, scripts, and test structure all in place. Note: environment has omit=dev in npm config — use npm install --include=dev.
TASK-002 (cross-platform support) ready for review. README updated, code was already cross-platform (chmod in try/catch). 27 tests passing.
